EmailTemplate.name: External Newsletter.2017-04-20
EmailTemplate.subject: Is Lean Possible in Government?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
April 20, 2017 <[[https://builttoadapt.io/your-irs-wait-time-is-3-hours-is-lean-possible-in-government-b701c60d74cf]]> “Your IRS Wait Time is 3 Hours”: Is Lean Possible in Government? Now that Tax Day is over, take some time to learn how the IRS embraced lean startup practices and built an app citizens craved. Read More <[[https://builttoadapt.io/your-irs-wait-time-is-3-hours-is-lean-possible-in-government-b701c60d74cf]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/apps-that-depend-on-file-storage-bring-em-over-to-pivotal-cloud-foundry]]> Apps That Depend on File Storage? Bring ‘em Over to Pivotal Cloud Foundry We've extended the definition of cloud-native to now include persisting state to files. Here's How <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/apps-that-depend-on-file-storage-bring-em-over-to-pivotal-cloud-foundry]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/the-google-sre-book-with-andrew-shafer-ep-58]]> The Google SRE Book With Andrew Shafer Andrew Shafer and Coté highlight some interesting and applicable topics in Google's new SRE book. Listen to the Episode <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/the-google-sre-book-with-andrew-shafer-ep-58]]> <[[http://springdays.io/]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/the-emergence-and-future-of-the-data-engineer]]> The Emergence and Future of the Data Engineer What role does a data engineer play in today's enterprise? Derek Comingore takes a closer look. Data Evolution <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/the-emergence-and-future-of-the-data-engineer]]> <[[https://medium.com/@ashleymcnamara/my-first-week-at-pivotal-acd6e6b4e16a]]> My First Week at Pivotal Ashley McNamara reflects on her first week as Principal Technologist at Pivotal. 1-2-3, Gopher! <[[https://medium.com/@ashleymcnamara/my-first-week-at-pivotal-acd6e6b4e16a]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/tutorial-using-isolation-segments-in-pcf-for-hub-and-spoke-isolation]]> Tutorial: Using Isolation Segments in Pivotal Cloud Foundry for Hub-and-Spoke Isolation Compliance rules often require workloads to run in isolation. Ryan Moran shows you how to use Isolation Segments for this scenario. Learn More <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/tutorial-using-isolation-segments-in-pcf-for-hub-and-spoke-isolation]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/camus-and-cloud-cache]]> Camus and Cloud Cache Find out how caching helps solve the problem of distributed computing in this episode of Pivotal Insights.
